author: cmpilato
msg: (handle_response): When setting a pending_error, also set the
returnable status and discard the body.

author: hwright
msg: Close the wc_db when closing it's associated access baton.  Also close the
underlying sqlite dbs when closing the wc_db.  This fixes several bugs where
svn complains about having too many open files.
(close_apr): Just no-op if the db has already been closed.
(do_close): If the associated set for the baton is empty, close the

author: rhuijben
msg: For issue #2028, #2556 (and probably a few others), remove the use of
svn_path_is_child in libsvn_wc. This function breaks paths at possibly
invalid locations.  (E.g. it fails on "A:file" style paths)

author: cmpilato
msg: In, HTTP v2, we don't have CHECKOUTs to tell us that something is out
of date.  Sometimes the message we get back is just that the item we
wanted to change isn't there any more, which could be due to
out-of-dateness, or could be due to something else.  Note that this is
consistent with the way svnserve works, too.
Granted, seeing 'not found' isn't as ideal as seeing 'out of date',
but masking potentially more harmful conditions with an XFail-ing test
is the greater sin in my book.  (We can always work to improve error
(commit_out_of_date_deletions): Allow 'not found' as well as 'out of
date' in the expected error message.

author: cmpilato
msg: Fix directory copies in HTTP v2.
(setup_copy_dir_headers): If using HTTP v2, use the already known
transaction root resource URL of the directory as its COPY
